prompts.name: weekly_triage

arguments.name: boardId
arguments.description: Optional board ID to focus on

prompts.template:
Analyze this week's feedback:
1. Top 3 themes by volume
2. High-revenue requests (>$50k)
3. Quick wins (high impact, low effort)
4. Duplicate candidates
5. Sentiment shifts from last week

prompts.name: sprint_planning
prompts.template:
Based on velocity of {velocity} points:
1. Apply RICE scoring
2. Consider engineering availability
3. Balance quick wins vs strategic
4. Account for dependencies
5. Suggest sprint backlog{focus}

prompts.name: executive_summary
prompts.template:
Generate executive summary:
1. Features shipped (with adoption metrics)
2. Top 10 requests by ARR impact
3. Churn risk features
4. Competitive gaps identified
5. 90-day roadmap preview

prompts.name: competitive_analysis
prompts.template:
Analyze requests mentioning competitors:
1. Most mentioned competitor features
2. Gaps in our product vs {competitor}
3. Customer segment requesting these
4. ARR impact of competitive gaps
5. Recommended prioritization

prompts.name: customer_health_check
prompts.template:
Customer health check for company {companyId}:
1. Recent feedback volume and sentiment
2. Open vs resolved requests
3. Feature requests blocking expansion
4. Churn risk indicators
5. Recommended actions
